description: HD Kumaraswamy passed the floor test with 117 Congress-JD(S) MLA's voting in favour of the newly appointed Chief Minister. Meanwhile, an estranged BJP led by BS Yeddyurappa staged a walkout on the issue of farm loan waivers.
title: Karnataka highlights: BJP announces state-wide protests as Cong-JD(S) passes floor test
title_page: Karnataka highlights: BJP announces state-wide protests as Cong-JD(S) passes floor test - Moneycontrol.com
text:
Karnataka RESULTS BJP 104 INC 78 JD(S)+ 38 OTHERS 2 222 / 224 Details » W+L / Total
* Polling for two assembly constituencies has been postponed to 28th May, 2018
